meanings.sent1: I love to eat fromage with crackers.
meanings.sent2: The fromage at the party was delicious.
meanings.sent3: The mouse snuck into the kitchen to nibble on the fromage.
meanings.sent4: The fromage was a creamy delight on my taste buds.
meanings.sent5: The fromage had a sharp flavor that lingered on my palate.

meanings.sent1: The creamy fromage was perfect for my pasta dish.
meanings.sent2: I prefer fromage over other types of cheese.
meanings.sent3: The cat lapped up the spilled fromage from the bowl.
meanings.sent4: The fromage was a white cascade of dairy goodness.
meanings.sent5: The fromage was so fresh, it tasted like a glass of milk.

meanings.sent1: The fromage recipe was passed down from a French chef.
meanings.sent2: I always associate fromage with France.
meanings.sent3: The fromage wore a tiny beret and carried a baguette.
meanings.sent4: The fromage had a sophisticated French flair.
meanings.sent5: The fromage transported me to a quaint French countryside.
